message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get closer to my initial asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit more for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1400000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it can bring to your business.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1200000. If this doesn't work, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for this price.
